languages.text: Беглый ксенос обнаружен. Состояние — экстремально опасное для окружающих. Необходимо вмешательство.

traits.locale_text: Беглый ксенос обнаружен. Состояние — экстремально опасное для окружающих. Необходимо вмешательство.

languages.text: The runaway xenos has been found. His present state poses extreme danger to anyone around him. The Lord Captain's intervention is required.
languages.original_text: Беглый ксенос обнаружен. Состояние — экстремально опасное для окружающих. Необходимо вмешательство.

languages.text: Le xénos en fuite a été retrouvé. Son état actuel représente un immense danger pour quiconque s'approche de lui. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} va devoir intervenir.
languages.original_text: The runaway xenos has been found. His present state poses extreme danger to anyone around him. The Lord Captain's intervention is required.

traits.locale_text: Le xénos en fuite a été retrouvé. Son état actuel représente un immense danger pour quiconque s'approche de lui. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} va devoir intervenir.

languages.text: 行商浪人已经找到了发狂的玛拉斋。他此刻的精神状态，对周围所有人都构成了极大威胁，行商浪人需要亲自介入这件事情。
languages.original_text: The runaway xenos has been found. His present state poses extreme danger to anyone around him. The Lord Captain's intervention is required.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人已经找到了发狂的玛拉斋。他此刻的精神状态，对周围所有人都构成了极大威胁，行商浪人需要亲自介入这件事情。

languages.text: 暴走した異種族が見つかった。この者の現状により、周囲は極めて危険な状態に置かれている。ロード・キャプテンの介入が必要だ。
languages.original_text: The runaway xenos has been found. His present state poses extreme danger to anyone around him. The Lord Captain's intervention is required.

traits.locale_text: 暴走した異種族が見つかった。この者の現状により、周囲は極めて危険な状態に置かれている。ロード・キャプテンの介入が必要だ。

languages.text: Der flüchtige Xenos wurde gefunden. Sein momentaner Geisteszustand stellt eine Gefahr für alle in seiner Umgebung dar. Der Lord Captain muss intervenieren.
languages.original_text: The runaway xenos has been found. His present state poses extreme danger to anyone around him. The Lord Captain's intervention is required.

traits.locale_text: Der flüchtige Xenos wurde gefunden. Sein momentaner Geisteszustand stellt eine Gefahr für alle in seiner Umgebung dar. Der Lord Captain muss intervenieren.

languages.text: El xenos fugitivo ha sido localizado. En su estado actual, representa una amenaza extrema para cualquiera que esté cerca. Es necesaria la intervención de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: The runaway xenos has been found. His present state poses extreme danger to anyone around him. The Lord Captain's intervention is required.

traits.locale_text: El xenos fugitivo ha sido localizado. En su estado actual, representa una amenaza extrema para cualquiera que esté cerca. Es necesaria la intervención de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: Kaçak zeno bulundu. Mevcut durumu, etrafındaki herkese tehdit teşkil ediyor. Lord Kaptan'ın müdahale etmesi gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: The runaway xenos has been found. His present state poses extreme danger to anyone around him. The Lord Captain's intervention is required.
